metadata.title: CVE-2022-20166 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In various methods of kernel base drivers, there is a possible out ofbounds write due to a heap buffer overflow. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-182388481References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
